trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class creates a TCP/IP or UDP LDAP connection to Microsoft Active Directory Domain Services or an LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> cria uma conexão TCP/IP ou LDAP UDP com o Microsoft Active Directory Domain Services ou um servidor LDAP.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> object and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> object are both set, the certificate specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> objeto e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> do objeto são definidas, o certificado especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> propriedade será ignorada.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: Gerado em caso de falha ao criar um bloco de conexão ou ao abrir uma conexão com o servidor.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> que especifica o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> usando o identificador de diretório especificado.

trans-unit.source: The logon credentials and the Negotiate Authentication are used to connect to the LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais de logon e a Autenticação de Negociação são usadas para se conectar ao servidor do LDAP.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: Gerado em caso de falha ao criar um bloco de conexão ou ao abrir uma conexão com o servidor.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the server which can be a domain name, LDAP server name or dotted strings representing the IP address of the LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que especifica o servidor que pode ser um nome de domínio, nome do servidor LDAP ou cadeias de caracteres com pontos que representam o endereço IP do servidor LDAP.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, this parameter may also include a port number, separated from the right end of the string by a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, esse parâmetro também pode incluir um número da porta, separado da extremidade direita da cadeia de caracteres por dois-pontos (:).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified server.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.String)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> usando o servidor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: Gerado em caso de falha ao criar um bloco de conexão ou ao abrir uma conexão com o servidor.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> que especifica o servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> que especifica as credenciais a serem usadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier and network credentials.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> usando o identificador de diretório especificado e as credenciais de rede.

trans-unit.source: Negotiate Authentication is used.
trans-unit.target: A Autenticação do Tipo Negociar é usada.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: Gerado em caso de falha ao criar um bloco de conexão ou ao abrir uma conexão com o servidor.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> que especifica o servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> que especifica as credenciais a serem usadas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> values that specifies the type of authentication to use.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> que especifica o tipo de autenticação a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier, network credentials, and authentication type.
trans-unit.target: O construtor do <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> usando o identificador do diretório especificado, as credenciais de rede e o tipo de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: Gerado em caso de falha ao criar um bloco de conexão ou ao abrir uma conexão com o servidor.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando <paramref name="authType" /> está fora do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is specified as Anonymous but <paramref name="credential" /> specified credentials.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando <paramref name="authType" /> é especificado como Anônimo, mas <paramref name="credential" /> especificou as credenciais.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que faz referência à solicitação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Abort(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method cancels the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Abort(System.IAsyncResult)" /> cancela a solicitação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> é nulo (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Thrown if <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by the corresponding call to <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" />
trans-unit.target: Gerado se <paramref name="asyncResult" /> não tiver sido retornado pela chamada correspondente para <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property contains the supported authentication types.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> contém os tipos de autenticação com suporte.

trans-unit.source: A supported authentication type.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo de autenticação com suporte.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando <paramref name="authType" /> está fora do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AutoBind" /> property specifies whether an automatic bind is allowed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AutoBind" /> especifica se uma associação automática é permitida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the automatic bind is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a associação automática é permitida. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sends data asynchronously to the server.
trans-unit.target: Envia dados de maneira assíncrona ao servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: A value from <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> enumeration that specifies the level of partial result to return.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> que especifica o nível de resultado parcial a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> function.
trans-unit.target: A função <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém os dados de estado para essa solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method sends data asynchronously to the server.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> envia dados de maneira assíncrona ao servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que faz referência ao envio assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> é <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Partial results are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para resultados parciais.

trans-unit.source: A callback function must be specified if <paramref name="partialMode" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma função de retorno de chamada deverá ser especificada se <paramref name="partialMode" /> for igual a <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, until the request times out.
trans-unit.target: O tempo, em segundos, antes que a solicitação atinja o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: A value from <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> enumeration that specifies the level of partial result to return.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> que especifica o nível de resultado parcial a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> function.
trans-unit.target: A função <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém os dados de estado para essa solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method sends data asynchronously to the server.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> envia dados de maneira assíncrona ao servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que faz referência ao envio assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> é nulo (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Partial results are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para resultados parciais.

trans-unit.source: A callback function must be specified if <paramref name="partialMode" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma função de retorno de chamada deverá ser especificada se <paramref name="partialMode" /> for igual a <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />.

trans-unit.source: Sends an LDAP bind.
trans-unit.target: Envia uma associação de LDAP.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind" /> method sends an LDAP bind using the current credentials.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind" /> envia uma associação LDAP usando as credenciais especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to one of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error codes.
trans-unit.target: O código de erro retornado pelo LDAP não é mapeado para um dos códigos de erro da enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" />.

trans-unit.source: Either the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> property specifies more than one client certificate to send for authentication, or the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property is Anonymous and one or more credentials are supplied.
trans-unit.target: Ou a propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> especifica mais de um certificado de cliente para enviar para autenticação ou então a propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> é Anonymous e uma ou mais credenciais são fornecidas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> que especifica as credenciais a serem usadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind(System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> method sends an LDAP bind using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind(System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> envia uma associação LDAP usando o <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: O código de erro retornado pelo LDAP não é mapeado para um código de erro de enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" />.

trans-unit.source: Either the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> property specifies more than one client certificate to send for authentication, or the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property is Anonymous and one or more credentials are supplied.
trans-unit.target: Ou a propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> especifica mais de um certificado de cliente para enviar para autenticação ou então a propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> é Anonymous e uma ou mais credenciais são fornecidas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Credential" /> property contains the network credentials for the object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Credential" /> contém as credenciais de rede para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The network credentials for the object.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais de rede para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Closes and optionally releases the LDAP handle.
trans-unit.target: Fecha e, opcionalmente, libera o identificador LDAP.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose" /> method closes and releases the LDAP handle.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose" /> fecha e libera o identificador LDAP.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is released when the connection is closed or <see langword="false" /> if the connection is closed without releasing the handle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o identificador for liberado quando a conexão for fechada; ou <see langword="false" /> se a conexão for fechada sem liberar o identificador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method closes the connection and optionally releases the LDAP handle.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> fecha a conexão e, opcionalmente, libera o identificador LDAP.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that contains state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que contém dados de estado para esta solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.EndSendRequest(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method completes an asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.EndSendRequest(System.IAsyncResult)" /> conclui uma solicitação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the results of the request.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> que contém os resultados da solicitação.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: Gerado se o objeto já tiver sido descartado.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> é nulo (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> does not match the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> returned in the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> não combina com o <paramref name="asyncResult" /> retornado na chamada <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: O código de erro retornado pelo LDAP não é mapeado para um código de erro de enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" />.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: Gerado se o servidor retornou um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> com um erro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Finalize" /> method allows an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Finalize" /> permite que um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes que objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> seja recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that contains state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que contém dados de estado para esta solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.GetPartialResults(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method retrieves partial results of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.GetPartialResults(System.IAsyncResult)" /> recupera resultados parciais de uma operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultsCollection" /> object that contains the partial results.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultsCollection" /> que contém os resultados parciais.

trans-unit.source: The object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> é nulo (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> does not match the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> returned in the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> não combina com o <paramref name="asyncResult" /> retornado na chamada <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: O código de erro retornado pelo LDAP não é mapeado para um código de erro de enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" />.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: Gerado se o servidor retornou um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> com um erro.

trans-unit.source: Sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
trans-unit.target: Envia um único <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> como uma operação do LDAP v3.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object that contains the request.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> que contém a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> method sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> envia um único <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> como uma operação do LDAP v3.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> que contém a resposta do servidor.

trans-unit.source: The object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> é nulo (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Request is of type DsmlAuthRequest.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação é do tipo DsmlAuthRequest.

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: O código de erro retornado pelo LDAP não é mapeado para um código de erro de enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" />.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: Gerado se o servidor retornou um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> com um erro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object that contains the request.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> que contém a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in seconds, until the request times out.
trans-unit.target: O período, em segundos, antes que o tempo limite da solicitação seja atingido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan)" /> method sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan)" /> envia um único <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> como uma operação do LDAP v3.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> que contém a resposta do servidor.

trans-unit.source: The object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do objeto não é válido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> é nulo (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Request is of type DsmlAuthRequest.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação é do tipo DsmlAuthRequest.

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: O código de erro retornado pelo LDAP não é mapeado para um código de erro da enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" />.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: Gerado se o servidor retornou um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> com um erro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SessionOptions" /> property contains an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> object that specifies the session options.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SessionOptions" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> que especifica as opções de sessão.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> object that specifies the session options.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> que especifica as opções de sessão.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> object and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> object are both set, the certificate specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> objeto e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> do objeto são definidas, o certificado especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> propriedade será ignorada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Timeout" /> property contains the length of time, in seconds, before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> times out.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Timeout" /> contém o período, em segundos, antes que o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> atinja o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in seconds, before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> times out.
trans-unit.target: O período, em segundos, antes que o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> atinja o tempo limite.
